name: opentelemetry-instrumentation-django
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "opentelemetry-instrumentation-django" %}
{% set version = "0.50b0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/opentelemetry_instrumentation_django-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 624fd0beb1ac827f2af31709c2da5cb55d8dc899c2449d6e8fcc9fa5538fd56b

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - hatchling
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - opentelemetry-api ~=1.12
    - opentelemetry-instrumentation-wsgi ==0.50b0
    - opentelemetry-instrumentation ==0.50b0
    - opentelemetry-semantic-conventions ==0.50b0
    - opentelemetry-util-http ==0.50b0
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.37b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.37b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.38b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.38b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.39b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.39b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.40b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.40b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.41b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.41b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.42b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.42b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.43b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.43b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-test-utils ==0.44b0
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-django 
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.44b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.45b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.46b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.47b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.48b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.49b0
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.49b1
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.49b2
    # - django >=1.10
    # - opentelemetry-instrumentation-asgi ==0.50b0
    # - django >=1.10

test:
  imports:
    - opentelemetry
    - opentelemetry.instrumentation
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python-contrib/tree/main/instrumentation/opentelemetry-instrumentation-django
  summary: OpenTelemetry Instrumentation for Django
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
    - mariusvniekerk
